doc.field: New-York Historical Society collection of New York City miscellaneous manuscripts
New-York Historical Society collection of New York City miscellaneous manuscripts

1709 New York State Council's Prayer to the Governor; Commission of Thos. Evans as Gunner at Ft. Anne, signed by Gov. Ingoldsby; Instructions issued by Gov. Ingoldsby to fit out Expedition Against the French at Canada

1709 New York State Council's Prayer to the Governor; Commission of Thos. Evans as Gunner at Ft. Anne, signed by Gov. Ingoldsby; Instructions issued by Gov. Ingoldsby to fit out Expedition Against the French at Canada
Expedition includes Pennsylvania, New Hampshirre and the Five Nations which will be paid in wampum.
